upgradePrompt.title: Quota Limit Reached
upgradePrompt.limitReached: You've reached your free tier lifetime limit. Upgrade to Pro to create more content and unlock premium features!
upgradePrompt.limitReachedPro: You've reached your monthly generation limit. Your quota will reset on the 1st of next month at midnight UTC.
upgradePrompt.resetInfo: You've reached your monthly generation limit. Your quota will reset on the 1st of next month at midnight UTC.
upgradePrompt.proQuotaInfo: As a Pro member, you get 30 generations per month across all content types.
upgradePrompt.quotaResetInfo: Your quota resets on the 1st of every month at midnight UTC.

proInfo.quotaDetail: First of every month at midnight UTC
